column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////It is slightly flakier
column2: while still being just the right level of chewy.  As promised by the waitress
column3: it did bring out the flavor of my pizza very well.  I ordered just an individual sized deep dish of cheese & black olives and it was great.  I'm craving it now
column4: actually!  We also ordered their sample platter with the fried mushrooms
column7: and fried cheddar cubes (which must be a Midwest thing as I've never seen them before in Cali) and it was really good and very ample as well.  The 3 of us couldn't finish it and our pizzas too.
